title: CradleCare
description: Created a web-based solution addressing the need for accessible and reliable information for pregnant women. Developed features for tracking progress, accessing resources, and fostering a supportive online community.

title: Weather-app
description: Developed a dynamic weather information webpage that provides real-time weather updates based on user-selected cities using React.js and OpenWeather API. Implemented responsive design for optimal viewing across devices.

title: Personal-portfolio
description: Developed a personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience using ReactJs, CSS,Json. Implemented responsive design for optimal viewing on various devices and integrated smooth navigation for enhanced user experience.
